ibdsim2-shiny

ibdsim2shiny.Rmd

Try ibdsim2-shiny here: https://magnusdv.shinyapps.io/ibdsim2-shiny.


What is ibdsim2-shiny?

An online tool for visualising and comparing distributions of IBD-sharing between pedigree members.

Created by Magnus Dehli Vigeland.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.1.
